procedure.title: Enabling encrypted connections
procedure.para: To enable SSL-encrypted connections to the server, complete the following steps:

step.para: Start the configuration interface of the &agent; application.
Right-click on the server that accepts encrypted connections and select Properties.

warning.para: The connection is established only if the &agent; can verify the certificate of the syslog server. For this, import one of the following certificates into the Certificate Store (MMC > Certificates > Computer Account > Local Computer > Trusted Root Certificates) of the Windows-based host:

listitem.para: The certificate of the Certificate Authority (CA) that issued the certificate of the server
If your server uses a self-signed certificate, import the self-signed certificate

warning.para: For details on importing certificates, see .

step.para: Select Apply, then OK. To activate the changes, restart the &agentabbrev; service.
